name: Orbit Orchard
description:
Originally my entry for "A Game By Its Cover 2017"

Also my first ever game jam!

(Currently the only point is to travel to other planets and find different fruits)

Controls:

-WASD or arrow keys to move

-Q and E to rotate while out of planet orbit

-Left Click to shoot seeds

-Hold Space or W to use Jetpack

-Shoot Fruit Clusters on planets to discover the fruit inside!

I chose to base mine off of Michael Shillingburg's Galaxy Garden cover art. 

I didn't get as far as I wanted to with it, but I am happy with how it's come along, and I plan to keep refining it.  It gave me the opportunity to learn a lot of new skills and improve my previous ones.
